details:
The Cardiovascular Center is dedicated to the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of heart and blood vessel diseases. Our center combines advanced medical technology with a multidisciplinary team of cardiologists, surgeons, nurses, and rehabilitation specialists to deliver comprehensive cardiac care. We focus on conditions such as coronary artery disease, heart failure, arrhythmias, hypertension, and congenital heart disorders.

Patients receive individualized care plans that begin with accurate diagnostics, including electrocardiograms, echocardiography, stress testing, and cardiac imaging. Based on these findings, our specialists recommend lifestyle modifications, medical therapy, or interventional procedures tailored to each patientâ€™s condition. We emphasize early detection and preventive cardiology to reduce long-term risks and improve quality of life.

In addition to clinical treatment, the Cardiovascular Center prioritizes patient education and long-term management. Our rehabilitation programs support recovery after cardiac events through supervised exercise, nutritional counseling, and emotional support. By combining innovation, expertise, and compassionate care, the center aims to help patients maintain a healthy heart and lead active, fulfilling lives.
